=encoding utf8

=head1 NAME

Lucy::Search::Collector::BitCollector - Collector which records doc nums in a BitVector.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    my $bit_vec = Lucy::Object::BitVector->new(
        capacity => $searcher->doc_max + 1,
    );
    my $bit_collector = Lucy::Search::Collector::BitCollector->new(
        bit_vector => $bit_vec, 
    );
    $searcher->collect(
        collector => $bit_collector,
        query     => $query,
    );

=head1 DESCRIPTION

BitCollector is a Collector which saves matching document ids in a
L<BitVector|Lucy::Object::BitVector>.  It is useful for recording the
entire set of documents which matches a query.

=head1 CONSTRUCTORS

=head2 new

    my $bit_collector = Lucy::Search::Collector::BitCollector->new(
        bit_vector => $bit_vec,    # required
    );

Create a new BitCollector.

=over

=item *

B<bit_vector> - A Lucy::Object::BitVector.

=back

=head1 METHODS

=head2 collect

    $bit_collector->collect($doc_id);

Set bit in the objectâ€™s BitVector for the supplied doc id.

=head1 INHERITANCE

Lucy::Search::Collector::BitCollector isa L<Lucy::Search::Collector> isa Clownfish::Obj.

=cut
